name: Froggy Familiars
description:
Step into the shoes of the owner of Froggy Familiars, the one stop shop for Magic Academy students seeking the noblest of familiars, the Frog. The frog is a symbol of change and transition, work hard to get that student change to transition into your pockets!

Created for Mini Jam 106: Frogs²

Press Escape for Credits and to turn on the music!
